Topic.Title: You wrote a game - you've got a story...

Posts.EditableText:
If you feel like writing out that story as poetry or prose, I've got an online mag that needs content - speculative fiction and speculative poetry.

The writer's guide is here: http://www.alteredrealitymag.com/writers-guide/  if you're interested.
Posts.HTML:
If you feel like writing out that story as poetry or prose, I've got an online mag that needs content - speculative fiction and speculative poetry.

The writer's guide is here: http://www.alteredrealitymag.com/writers-guide/ if you're interested.
